definitions: an invitation to return for a second audition or interview

examples.text: he was one of only twelve applicants to receive a callback

shortDefinitions: invitation to return for second audition or interview

definitions: a phone call made to return a call received.
shortDefinitions: phone call made to return one that someone has received

definitions: a security feature used by systems accessed by phone, in which a remote user must log on using a previously registered phone number, to which the system then places a return call.
shortDefinitions: security feature used by some computer systems accessed by phone, in which user must log on from previously registered phone number

definitions: a recall of a defective product

examples.text: ask which products have the most callbacks

definitions: an emergency call summoning an employee to work after hours

examples.text: uncontrolled air leakage results in increased callbacks

shortDefinitions: emergency call summoning employee to work after hours
